fields.name: Notion Labs, Inc
fields.description: A San-Francisco–based software company focused on building flexible productivity tools for individuals and teams. They’re known for keeping the product clean, customizable, and community-driven.

fields.name: SoundLeaf Technologies
fields.description: A small audio-software studio that specializes in speech processing tools for everyday users. They develop simple, practical apps that help people capture ideas on the go.

fields.name: The Document Foundation
fields.description: A non-profit organization that stewards several open-source projects around document creation and management. They rely heavily on community contributors and long-term volunteers.

fields.name: CapsuleNet Systems
fields.description: A mid-sized software company focused on file management and distributed storage systems. Their tools are aimed at small teams that want simpler alternatives to enterprise cloud suites.
